summary: Premium, visually rich e‑commerce website for The Flower Box featuring dynamic animations, deep product storytelling, SEO‑optimized content, lead capture forms, and optional integrations such as Shopify or WooCommerce, email marketing, and local SEO tools.
sections: Custom order process with step‑by‑step guide
Product detail pages with 360° view and video
Gallery with high‑resolution images & video reels
Contact form with map and business hours
Footer with links, social icons, privacy & terms
style_notes: Premium aesthetic using soft floral palettes (lavender, blush, sage) paired with crisp typography (serif for headings, sans‑serif for body). Subtle hover animations, scroll‑triggered parallax effects, and micro‑interactions on product cards. Fully responsive grid, dark mode option, and accessibility‑first design (WCAG 2.1 AA).
assets_needed: High‑resolution product photos (front, back, close‑up, lifestyle)
Lifestyle images of arrangements in home settings
Short promotional videos (30‑60s) showcasing bouquet making
Social media icons (customized), "Shop Now" button graphics
SEO keyword list & meta tag templates
Copy for all pages (including SEO‑friendly headings)
API keys/credentials for optional integrations (Shopify/WooCommerce, Mailchimp, Google Maps)
